xml.resource:
<html>
<head>
<meta charset="UTF-8">
<title>strabic test</title> 
<style type="text/css">
body {
  width: $1px;
	height: $2px;
  font-family: $3;
  color: $4;
  background-color: $5;

	/* Grid */
  background-size: $6px $6px;
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13) 2px, rgba(0,0,0,0) 2px),
  -webkit-linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13) 1px, rgba(0,0,0,0) 2px);

  background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13) 2px, rgba(0,0,0,0) 2px),
  -moz-linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13) 1px, rgba(0,0,0,0) 2px);

  background-image: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13) 1px, rgba(0,0,0,0) 2px),
  linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13) 1px, rgba(0,0,0,0) 2px);
	
}
</style>
<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.2.min.js"></script>
<script src="libstrabic.js"></script>
</head>
<body>

<script type="text/javascript">
  /* Scroll middle page */
 	var height = $(document).height();
 	var width = $(document).width();
  $(document).scrollTop(height/4);
  $(document).scrollLeft(width/4);
</script>
</body>
</html>

<style type="text/css">
.$1 {
	width:$2px;
	height:$3px;
	border: solid 2px black;
	font-size: 10px;
	text-align: center;
	line-height: 70px
}
</style>

<style type="text/css">
.$1 {
	font-size:12px;
	line-height: normal;
	font-weight: bold
}
</style>
